column4: hi, can someone help me mount a drive on the livecd..... i'm sorta new to linux :)
it depends what filesystem is on the partition you wanna mount
- so would this work? mount /dev/sda3 -t ext3 /mnt/old
- a path name is not a dricetory?
then perhaps you don't have a /dev/sda
what makes you think you have a /dev/sdx in your machine?
- i did when i installed ubuntu.....
- and i checked hda as well, it jsut doens't do anything, remember thsi is a live cd
- am i doing something wrong with the /dev/
- is there any way to just see every drive form the livecd?
live CD or not, it should detect all your drives in your system, but not mount them indeed.
then do a sudo "parted /dev/sda print", it'll show you which filesystems are ob which partitions
